hooks.name: compile-check-maven
hooks.description: Run Maven compile check after Java edits
hooks.command: if [ -f pom.xml ]; then mvn compile -q 2>&1 | grep -E '\[ERROR\]' | head -10; fi || true

hooks.name: compile-check-gradle
hooks.description: Run Gradle compile check after Java edits
hooks.command: if [ -f build.gradle ] || [ -f build.gradle.kts ]; then ./gradlew compileJava --console=plain 2>&1 | grep -E '^e:' | head -10; fi || true

hooks.name: pre-commit-quality-gate-maven
hooks.description: Full Maven quality check before git commits
hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'git commit' && [ -f pom.xml ]; then mvn compile test -q; fi

hooks.name: pre-commit-quality-gate-gradle
hooks.description: Full Gradle quality check before git commits
hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'git commit' && [ -f build.gradle ]; then ./gradlew build --console=plain; fi
